verses.name: Esther 1:1
verses.text: Now it came to pass in the days of Ahasuerus, (this is Ahasuerus which reigned, from India even unto Ethiopia, over an hundred and seven and twenty provinces:)

verses.name: Esther 1:2
verses.text: That in those days, when the king Ahasuerus sat on the throne of his kingdom, which was in Shushan the palace,

verses.name: Esther 1:3
verses.text: In the third year of his reign, he made a feast unto all his princes and his servants; the power of Persia and Media, the nobles and princes of the provinces, being before him:
